This is being implemented as a large scale project. Changing the software "as it fails" is far from feasible, and more specifically, JUnit is being used for black-box testing (ie manipulating GUI elements and comparing them to BMP's etc). 

Each "test" is implemented very simularly to a script. Click this GUI button, compare this label to a BMP, etc. 

-Raffie-
